mapper.select: select no_num, no_title, calendar_date, no_date, r from (select no_num, no_title, calendar_date, no_date, rownum r from (select no_num, no_title, calendar_date, no_date from Notice order by no_num desc )order by no_num desc ) where r >= #{startRow} and r <= #{endRow}
mapper.insert: insert into Notice(no_num, no_title, no_content, calendar_date, no_date) values (no_seq.nextval, #{no_title}, #{no_content}, #{calendar_date}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update Notice set no_title = #{no_title}, no_content = #{no_content}, calendar_date = #{calendar_date} where no_num=#{no_num}
mapper.delete: delete from Notice where no_num=#{no_num, jdbcType=INTEGER}
